sen.j: 金春 信高（こんぱる のぶたか、1920年（大正9年） -）は、シテ方金春流能楽師。
sen.e: Nobutaka KONPARU (1920 -) is a Noh actor of the Konparu school of lead actors (shite-kata).
Nobutaka KONPARU (1920 -) is a Noh actor of the Konparu school of shite-kata (lead actors).
Nobutaka KONPARU (1920 -) is a Noh actor of the Konparu school of shite-kata (lead actors).
The 79th head of the Konparu school of lead actors

sen.cmt: of lead actors削除、ピリオド追加
sen.e: The 79th head of the Konparu school.

sen.j: 七十八世金春八条（光太郎）の長男として奈良に生まれる。
sen.e: He was born in Nara as the eldest son of Hachijo (Mitsutaro) KONPARU the 78th.
He was born in Nara as the eldest son of Hachijo (Mitsutaro) KONPARU, the 78th head of the school.
sen.cmt: the 78th→, the 78th head of the schoolとしました。
sen.e: He was born in Nara as the eldest son of Hachijo (Mitsutaro) KONPARU, the 78th head of the school.
He moved his base to Tokyo in 1956.

Yasuaki KONPARU is his eldest son.
